entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Revise pthread_condattr_setclock on Android #58737
    6.0.0
  • Reconsider conversion operators `Date` <-- > `DateTime` #58734
  • [API Proposal]: Add Unsafe.AsOut method to simplify out parameters casting #58732
  • Assertion failed 'block->countOfInEdges() > 0' during 'Remove empty finally' with infinite loop in finally #58729
  • Test failure: GetAsyncWithRedirect_SetCookieContainer_CorrectCookiesSent #58725
    Future
  • Test failure: KeepAlivePingDelay_Infinite_NoKeepAlivePingIsSent #58724
    Future
  • Https against invalid domain names (containing underscores) behaves differently on Linux than Windows and macOS #58722
  • [API Proposal]: Hide and obsolete `TypedReference.SetTypedReference`. #58721
  • StopAsync of BackgroundServices is called sequentially #58715
  • Consider stripping \\?\ from AppDomain.CurrentDomain.BaseDirectory #58714
  • StreamReader.ReadLineAsync cannot quit even if Close() is called. #58713
  • Consider Uri .ctor to allow for paths starting with \\?\ #58712
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Test failure on windows #58709
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] Windows: Test failures for `System.Globalization.Extensions.Tests` #58708
  • [wasm][aot] Windows: Test failures for `System.IO.FileSystem.Tests` #58707
  • Mono does not consider cgroup constraints when determining memory sizes #58706
    7.0.0
  • Certificate SHA1withRSA encryption method dotnet Framework and dotnet core calculation results are inconsistent #58705
  • Test failure SampleSynthesisTests.SynthesizeRecognizeTests.SpeechSynthesizerToSpeechRecognitionEngine #58704
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_45929/test45929/test45929.sh #58702
  • Test failure readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.sh #58699

Closed

  • Intermittent deadlock in .NET 5.0.5 while attached to debugger #52379
    Future
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58656
    6.0.0
  • In .NET 6, Preview 7, having a property name with space and using JsonSourceGenerationOptions causes errors in generated files #58580
  • Using `ToastNotificationManagerCompat` etc. with .NET 5 #58697
  • STJ Source Generator generates invalid code with value tuples #58137
    6.0.0
  • stackalloc behavior with constant size that isn't a power of 2 #55001
    7.0.0
  • [Libraries][iOS/MacCatalyst/tvOS] IsIanaIdTest fails from mismatched expectation #58440
    7.0.0
  • Reading configuration settings fails with System.UriFormatException: 'Invalid URI: The hostname could not be parsed.' #56897
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Windows 8 detection. #58736
    area-System.Security
  • [System.IO.Hashing] Expose methods to get 32-bits and 64-bits hash values #58735
    area-System.IO
  • Expose nint/nuint overloads for BitOperations #58733
    area-System.Numerics
  • Avoid S.S.Permissions dependency in S.S.Crypto.Xml #58731
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] WebSocket perf test #58730
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix pause on exception behavior #58728
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Better codegen for `(T)x | (T)y` #58727
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Align preallocationSize behavior #58726
    area-System.IO
  • [release/6.0] Fix source generation support for tuples with explicitly named elements #58723
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Always write sample events in EventPipe based on sample frequency. #58720
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [mono] Disable tests relying on precise GC #58719
  • [release/6.0] add TLS 1.3 support to WinHttp #58718
    area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • Add test for implicit time zone conversion for mobile platforms #58717
  • PosixSignalRegistrationTests.Unix: validate signal pal mapping #58711
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/6.0] Make sure EventPipe streaming thread won't write session->streaming_thread after session free. #58710
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Fix building GC on Android #58703
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Move Android SDK logic to /eng #58700
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix HAVE_PTHREAD_CONDATTR_SETCLOCK detection on Android #58701
    area-System.Threading
  • Fix source generation support for tuples with explicitly named elements #58644
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Allow instrumentation for methods with explicit tail calls #58632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove redundant zeroing for small stackallocs with SkipLocalsInit #55004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Skip covariant store checks when jit sees exact Array's type #58696
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Libraries] Fix TimeZoneInfoTests IsIanaIdTest for iOS/MacCatalyst/tvOS #58562
  • [libraries] Restrict ILLink Suppression xml to mobile platforms #58519
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Fix ConfigurationManager when BaseDirectory starts with \\?" #58627
    area-System.Configuration
  • Make sure EventPipe streaming thread won't write session->streaming_thread after session free. #58615
    area-Tracing-coreclr

Updated

  • Add documentation to System.Net #57855
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Make sure IPGlobalProperties and NetworkInterface.GetIsNetworkAvailable methods return the correct info #57096
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Net, os-ios, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT][wasm] WebSocket improve send buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • Simplify .NETFramework tfms #58558
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Send RST_STREAM instead EOF when sending request body is cancelled #58548
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Spannified internals of BigInteger #35565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Support JsonConverterFactory with src-gen #58652
    area-System.Text.Json
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0] add Http3LoopbackConnection.ShutdownAsync and use in AcceptConnectionAsync #58336
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Increase some of the DnsEndPointTest timeouts #58617
    area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • FreeBSD fix for AF_UNIX IPC socket permission #58688
  • Improve error messages expanding single-file #58557
    area-Single-File, 7.0.0
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Don't force using the system libunwind for source-build #58641
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Use arcade power source build infra #58651
    area-Infrastructure
  • DO NOT MERGE: Macos builds on perf measure pool #58514
    * NO MERGE *
  • Fix minor typo in inline comments in Decimal.cs #58694
    area-System.Runtime
  • JIT: Convert Interlocked intrinsics to NamedIntrinsics #55170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #58578
    area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tests on ARM segfaulted #1517
  • ARM build failed #1513

Closed

  • Can't get stack traces when reflection disabled #1283
  • NativeAOT: "Undefined instruction was hit" in StartupCodeHelpers.InitializeModules #1499
  • Failed to made HttpClient work on Windows in reflection free mode #1512

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add test coverage for dataflow to fields #1516
    area-NativeAOT
  • Call registerSymbol on potentially new symbols #1519
    area-NativeAOT
  • Fixes around reflection disabled mode #1518
    area-NativeAOT
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Do not use mmap/munmap #1510
  • Progress towards Android build #1514
    area-NativeAOT
  • Correct instructions how to run smoke tests on Linux #1515
  • Fix compilation errors on ARM #1511

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Reflection fix - add test and dependency for GetDependenciesDueToAccess #1508
  • Add publish support on ARM platform #1387

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Workload installation creates inaccessible folders when running as standard user #20691
  • missing dependency Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten #20683

PullRequests

Created

  • Use null-coalescing assignment operator #20678

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0.4xx' => 'main' #20555
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [WIP] Support installing workloads in user folder #18823
    Area-Workloads
  • [6.0.1xx-rc1] Fix PlatformNotSupportedException for Windows (arm64) #20524
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Roslyn doesn't learn from System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis attributes on deconstruction parameters when checking switch expressions' null exhaustiveness #56214
  • Add DateTimeProvider to Incremental Source Generator API #56212
  • Code formatting is not applying when code clean up is run #56211

Closed

  • `Make container 'async'` try to insert an `async` at strange place #56006
  • the compilerOptions of /optionexplicit- not work #55803

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56210
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56209
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Fix await completion provider to handle non-"true" local function declarations #56196
    Area-IDE

Updated

  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Startup regression: endpoint, fortunes #36212
  • Kestrel certificate with docker-compose: BIO routines:BIO_new_file:no such file #36211
  • Reduce allocation for OnPrepareResponse event in StaticFile Middleware #36210
  • Serial Port support on Android #36209
  • Blazor HttpClient has null entries when JSON deserialized into collections #36205
  • Kestrel doesn't allow to use self-signed certificates. #36204
  • MSBuild cannot see the files whose extension is changed to .cs #36203
  • Kestrel on Debian/Ubuntu not sending private intermediate cert #36202
  • Startup regression: plaintext #36200
  • Add MapPatch overloads to routing #36198
  • 🐞 `WebApplication.CreateBuilder(args).Host.Properties` cannot share context value. #36197
  • Access Modifiers #36196
    Discussions

Closed

  • Startup regression: connectionclose, https #35961
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #36199
  • Java SignalR: App is crashed if AccessTokenProvider Single emits an Error #35968
  • Startup regression: fortunes_dapper #36187
  • Startup regression: connectionclose #36190
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, mvc #36150
  • Perf improvement: json, json #36189
  • "Consumes" attribute alters the action endpoint when content-type mismatch #36195
  • "Consumes attribute alters the action endpoint #36194

PullRequests

Created

  • Make E2E tests work on Linux, support retries, and have new Azure pipeline #36207
  • Adding test coverage for host builder properties #36201

Merged

  • DisposeAsync the FileStream #36191
  • Avoid creating StaticFileResponseContext if OnPrepareResponse has not been set #36193
  • [release/6.0] Add nullable support to BindAsync #36128
    area-web-frameworks

Updated

  • Fix how host configuration is handled in WebApplicationBuilder #36186
    feature-minimal-hosting
  • Use minimal APIs for F# project templates #35833
    area-mvc
  • Improve error messages for missing body and services #36064
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] React to dotnet/runtime#57816 #36155
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Enhancement] Progressbar handlers should use Paint #2403
  • Maui library? #2402
  • [Bug] - Which devices supports MAUI #2400

Closed

  • [Bug] maui-check is ok,but can not create maui project #2394

PullRequests

Merged

  • Implement ProgressColor property in ProgressBarHandlers #600

Updated

  • Include Border everywhere #650
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • WebView Handlers #694
    6.0.100-rc.2
  • Port Editor.HorizontalTextAlignment to Handler #840
  • Make Application Nullable #2034
  • Implement IsTextPredictionEnabled in WinUI Entry #1477
    platform/windows 🪟
  • Workload targets improvements (#1611) 2.0 #2011
    6.0.100-rc.2
  • Provide a Date? so that Date can have a null value for UI elements to make it easier when user does not select a date #2306
  • Remove previewer's hooks #2348
  • Implement ImageSource property in WinUI ButtonHandler #1235
    platform/windows 🪟

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Easier way configure conversion for all properties of readonly struct type #25896
  • Avoid generating proxies when they're not needed #25892
  • Attribute.IsDefined is a perf hotsport during model building #25891
  • Introduction of JsonTypeInfo <TValue> in one of the Serialize overloads breaks the code in .net 6 #25889
  • Please help to debug the dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold command #25888
  • Cosmos: Issues when loading derived type via base set and vice versa #25886
  • System.IO.FileLoadException: Could not load file or assembly 'netstandard, Version=2.1.0.0' #25885

Closed

  • Query: query compilation error for query projecting collection_of_entities.Contains(null) #19702
    6.0.0
  • Reopen: EF Core 5 AsSplitQuery() can not work with OData WebApi #25882

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow setting original/current values using a typed dictionary #25895
  • Store store-generated FK values in the store-generated snapshot #25894
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlcipher from 2.0.5-pre20210521085756 to 2.0.5 #25890
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Cosmos: return null instead of throwing from Find #25887

Merged

  • Add test for projected Contains(null) #25893

Updated

  • Query: add translation for string.IndexOf(string, int) #25396 #25655
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25877

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, installer, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1, validation-installer-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1 #installer-106683-.NET6.0.1xxSDKRC1 #11883
